fields.name: DisplayPBRecordsRetrieved
fields.fieldText:
You have successfully cloned the Marketing Activity and any associated Participating Brands.
Please ensure you make the necessary changes to the new clone (Dates, Marketing Campaign etc) after you have finished.
Please now click Finish.

fields.name: Info
fields.fieldText:
You are about to clone this Marketing Activity and all the Participating Brands associated to it.
The Participating Brands will all be set to "Target" and require that you manually edit them.

fields.name: Start
Please_Enter_the_New_Name_of_Your_Marketing_Actvitity
fields.fieldText: Please Enter the New Name of your Marketing Activity

validationRule.errorMessage: Please enter a name less than 80 charaacters long

fields.name: Warning
fields.fieldText:
By Clicking "Next" you acknowledge that you will be creating a new, cloned Marketing Activity with a new set of Participating Brands.
You are requested to edit the new clone immediately upon its creation.
